aircraft.value: Stormbird Attack - AC-3179-116 at Base Alpha

defect_observed.value: Starter generator malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 01/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 04/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 11/11/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
